name: A Kiss from Death (itch)
description:
1905, Sal Island, Cape Verde.

Lucinda, a curious 7-year-old girl meets a strange and mysterious child at the cemetery. Despite their eerie personality, Lucinda finds herself drawn to the child's captivating presence and befriends them. However, their friendship is short-lived when she moves away to a different island.

Fast forward to years later, as Lucinda returns to her hometown to get married, she is shocked to see her old friend again. But as she delves deeper into the past, she realizes that her friend is not who they seem to be and their reunion brings with it a trail of unsettling secrets and revelations related to their separation and to her own destiny.

  • Short game: >30min of gameplay
  • Deeply story-driven game, where all your choices have consequences.
  • 3 different endings: depending on the choices you make throughout the game, you unlock different endings.
  • Atmospheric setting:  beautiful and mysterious Sal Island as its backdrop, with detailed graphics and immersive sound design that draws players into it.
  • Engaging story: Intriguing tale full of twists and turns that will keep you engaged and eager to uncover the truth.
  • Character development: watch as Lucinda grows and guide her while choosing the best life path for herself.
  • Emotional impact: Lucinda's story is an emotional one. You'll experience many emotions as you navigate through her life.
Viewer discretion is strongly advised for this game as it contains disturbing content and themes such as:
  • Jumpscares
  • Violence
  • Abuse (both physical and psychological)
  • Blood
  • Murder.

This story is intended to provoke deep emotional responses from players and may not be suitable for all audiences.

If you are easily disturbed by violence or have experienced trauma related to violent situations, we recommend that you do not play this game. Please seek assistance from a qualified professional or an anti-violence helpline. Finally...
